programme.desc: Souma is summoned to Elfrieden Kingdom. The King sees his potential and decides to let him be the next King.

programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sébastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: Oskar & Lilli: Where No One Knows Us
programme.desc: Chechen siblings Oskar and Lilli face deportation from Austria but are separated in foster care after their mother’s suicide attempt. Meeting in secret, the siblings hold onto hope that they will reunite as a family someday.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: In post-COVID Tokyo, single mother Megumi is desperate to find her missing son Shinpei. After a shady young man claims to know her son’s whereabouts, he is invited into Megumi’s home where he soon uncovers a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Cuban
programme.desc: An unexpected friendship begins between an elderly Cuban musician with dementia who is brought out of his shell by his care worker, and a disillusioned young pre-med Afghan student named Mina. Through a shared love of music, both their lives are changed.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmen’s quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.title: The Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: In this suspense thriller, Felix, an architect, lets a stranger into his home to use his phone. When the man suddenly disappears inside the house, Felix finds himself in in a cat and mouse chase and his house becomes a maze.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.
